name: Witch: A Special Delivery
storyline: A sad witch laments over not being good at anything. In order to find out what she's talented at, she decides to use magic. Thus she sets out on a quest to gather three eyes of newt in order to complete the spell and figure out her calling in life.
summary: Take control of a witch and help her find her purpose in life while helping out others with various quests and deliveries. Find power-ups, defeat enemies and explore the world in this short metroidvania-styled game.
